name: part_002
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】桃鈴ねね x 星街すいせい x 常闇トワ　Christmas Live【 #ねねすいトワクリスマスライブ 】 [VVQQcI6r3NU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Tokoyami Towa performs her original song 'Oiru' on stage with a vibrant lighting setup.
A transition scene showing the enthusiastic crowd with glowing lightsticks, moving into the next performance.
Hoshimachi Suisei takes the stage to perform her original song 'Palette' amidst a snowy visual effect.

subtitles.original: ちょっとだけおんなじ気持ち共有したくて
subtitles.english: I just wanted to share the same feelings a little bit.

subtitles.original: そう　キラキラキラキラ叩いても
subtitles.english: Even if I strike those sparkling, sparkling things,

subtitles.original: そっぽ向いたコトバ待っても
subtitles.english: even if I wait for words that look away...

subtitles.original: いつものキミでいいんだよ
subtitles.english: You're fine just the way you always are.

subtitles.original: 一緒に食べよう
subtitles.english: Let's eat together.

subtitles.original: ヒステリアずっとは　言えない地味な日々だけど
subtitles.english: Plain days where I can't stay in hysteria forever,

subtitles.original: 何故だろう最近は　少しキラキラなんだ
subtitles.english: but for some reason, they've been a bit sparkling lately.

subtitles.original: どんなに直前に　嫌なことあっても
subtitles.english: No matter what unpleasant things happen right before,

subtitles.original: キミに会えると思うと　ニヤけちゃってさ
subtitles.english: just thinking I'll see you makes me grin.

subtitles.original: ねえ　Oh キラキラキラキラ一緒に
subtitles.english: Hey, oh, sparkling, sparkling together,

subtitles.original: キラキラキラキラ食べよう
subtitles.english: let's eat something sparkling, sparkling.

subtitles.original: 一人よりきっと楽しくなるから
subtitles.english: Because it'll surely be more fun than being alone.

subtitles.original: そう　キラキラキラキラ叩き出し
subtitles.english: Right, striking out those sparkles,

subtitles.original: 変なコト考えないでよ
subtitles.english: don't think about weird things.

subtitles.original: まあ別にいいけど
subtitles.english: Well, I don't really mind, though.

subtitles.original: 知ってるかな　キミがくれる
subtitles.english: I wonder if you know, each and every word

subtitles.original: コトバひとつひとつ
subtitles.english: that you give to me...

subtitles.original: 嬉しくなったり楽しくなったり　不思議なパワーを感じる
subtitles.english: Makes me happy and makes me excited, I feel a mysterious power.

subtitles.original: ってコト
subtitles.english: ...is what I'm saying.

subtitles.original: ねえ　Oh キラキラキラキラ一緒に　キラキラキラキラ食べよう
subtitles.english: Hey, oh, sparkling, sparkling together, let's eat something sparkling, sparkling.

subtitles.original: ちょっとだけおんなじ気持ち共有したくて
subtitles.english: I just wanted to share the same feelings a little bit.

subtitles.original: そう　キラキラキラキラ叩いても
subtitles.english: Even if I strike those sparkling, sparkling things,

subtitles.original: そっぽ向いたコトバ待っても
subtitles.english: even if I wait for words that look away...

subtitles.original: いつでもキミがいいんだよ
subtitles.english: It's always you that I want.

subtitles.original: 一緒に食べよう
subtitles.english: Let's eat together.

subtitles.original: Palette
subtitles.english: Palette

subtitles.original: 風に吹かれて　誰も気づかぬほど　区別がつかない　モノクロの世界
subtitles.english: Blown by the wind, so much so that no one notices, a monochrome world where nothing is distinct.

subtitles.original: 色を足しても　何も見えなくて　まるで私は　息を止めていた
subtitles.english: Even if I added color, I could see nothing; it was as if I was holding my breath.

subtitles.original: もういいよ　遠くても　叶えたい　私は
subtitles.english: It's okay now, even if it's far, I want to make it come true.

subtitles.original: この世界　想いを　抱きしめていたいのに
subtitles.english: I want to embrace my feelings in this world, and yet...

subtitles.original: 夢のキャンバスに　居続ける意味は
subtitles.english: The meaning of continuing to stay on this canvas of dreams,

subtitles.original: この胸に　輝いている　ストーリー
subtitles.english: is the story shining within my heart.

subtitles.original: 数えることに　意味などないけれど　拾い集めた　カケラをしまうの
subtitles.english: There's no meaning in counting them, but I'll store away the fragments I've gathered.

subtitles.original: そして夜はその冷たさを　溶かして手を伸ばし
subtitles.english: And then the night melts that coldness, and reaches out its hand...
